name: KeysforKids60FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Check out the daily devotional for kids presented by Keys for Kids Ministries! Read or listen online, download the mobile app, or get it in the mail! Just visit keysforkids.org/getkeys
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
